00067 QModelIndex LibraryData::index(int row, int column,
00068                 const QModelIndex& parent) const {
00069 
00070         // if invalid row
00071         if (row >= table_.size() || row < 0) {
00072                 return QModelIndex();
00073         }
00074         // if invalid column
00075         else if (column < 0 || column > 4) {
00076                 return QModelIndex();
00077         }
00078         // this is not hierarchical model so parent can not be valid
00079         else if (parent.isValid()) {
00080                 return QModelIndex();
00081         }
00082 
00083         return createIndex(row, column, table_.value(row));
00084 }

00108 QVariant LibraryData::data(const QModelIndex& index,
00109                 int role) const {
00110 
00111         // if index is not valid
00112         if (!index.isValid()) {
00113                 return QVariant();
00114         }
00115         // if row is invalid
00116         else if (index.row() >= table_.size() || index.row() < 0) {
00117                 return QVariant();
00118         }
00119         // if column is invalid
00120         else if (index.column() > 4 || index.column() < 0) {
00121                 return QVariant();
00122         }
00123 
00124         // if role is displayRole
00125         else if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00126 
00127                 // return the right value from vlnv identified by column
00128                 return table_.at(index.row())->getElement(index.column());
00129         }
00130 
00131         // if role is tooltipRole
00132         else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole) {
00133                 switch (index.column()) {
00134 
00135                 // VLNV type
00136                 case 0: {
00137                         return tr("The type of the IP-Xact document");
00138                 }
00139                 // VLNV vendor
00140                 case 1: {
00141 
00142                         return tr("The value of the vendor element in VLNV");
00143                 }
00144                 // VLNV Library
00145                 case 2: {
00146                         return tr("The value of the library element in VLNV");
00147                 }
00148                 // VLNV Name
00149                 case 3: {
00150                         return tr("The value of the name element in VLNV");
00151                 }
00152                 // VLNV Version
00153                 default: {
00154                         return tr("The value of the version element in VLNV");
00155                 }
00156                 }
00157         }
00158 
00159         // if role is foreground
00160         else if (role == Qt::ForegroundRole) {
00161                 QColor textColor;
00162 
00163                 if (table_.value(index.row())->documentIsValid()) {
00164                         textColor = QColor("black");
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 // if the document is not valid then it is marked with red color
00168                 else {
00169                         textColor = QColor("red");
00170                 }
00171 
00172                 return QBrush(textColor);
00173         }
00174         // if unsupported role
00175         else {
00176                 return QVariant();
00177         }
00178 }

00180 Qt::ItemFlags LibraryData::flags(const QModelIndex& index) const {

00182         if (!index.isValid()) {
00183                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00184         }
00185         return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00186 }

00188 QVariant LibraryData::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation,
00189                 int role) const {
00190 
00191         // if section is invalid
00192         if (section < 0 || section > 4) {
00193                 return QVariant();
00194         }
00195         // only horizontal orientation is supported
00196         else if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal) {
00197                 return QVariant();
00198         }
00199         // if role is display role
00200         else if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00201 
00202                 switch (section) {
00203 
00204                 // VLNV type
00205                 case 0: {
00206                         return tr("Type");
00207                 }
00208                 // VLNV vendor
00209                 case 1: {
00210                         return tr("Vendor");
00211                 }
00212                 // VLNV Library
00213                 case 2: {
00214                         return tr("Library");
00215                 }
00216                 // VLNV Name
00217                 case 3: {
00218                         return tr("Name");
00219                 }
00220                 // VLNV Version
00221                 default: {
00222                         return tr("Version");
00223                 }
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         // if unsupported role
00227         else {
00228                 return QVariant();
00229         }
00230 }

00236 void LibraryData::onExportItem(const QModelIndex& index) {
00237         if (!index.isValid())
00238                 return;
00239 
00240         VLNV* vlnv = static_cast<VLNV*>(index.internalPointer());
00241 
00242         if (!vlnv->isValid())
00243                 return;
00244

00248 void LibraryData::getDirectory(QStringList& list) {
00249         // empty the list
00250         list.clear();
00251 
00252         // create the dialog
00253         QFileDialog fileChooser(handler_, Qt::Dialog);
00254 
00255         // select directories
00256         fileChooser.setFileMode(QFileDialog::Directory);
00257 
00258         // only display directories
00259         fileChooser.setOptions(QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly);
00260 
00261         // view as list
00262         fileChooser.setViewMode(QFileDialog::List);
00263 
00264         // the default directory is the users home directory
00265         fileChooser.setDirectory(QDir::toNativeSeparators(QDir::homePath()));
00266 
00267         // execute the dialog and if user clicks "ok" then add the selected files
00268         // to the list
00269         if (fileChooser.exec()) {
00270                 list = fileChooser.selectedFiles();
00271         }
00272         return;
00273 }

00275 // scan the folder recursively for IP-Xact documents
00276 void LibraryData::scanFolder(const QString &path/*, QXmlSchema& schema*/) {
00277 
00278         // set current working directory to path
00279         QDir dirHandler(path);
00280 
00281         // get list of files and folders
00282         QStringList dirList(dirHandler.entryList(QDir::NoDotAndDotDot |
00283                         QDir::AllDirs | QDir::Files));
00284 
00285         // go through every file and folder
00286         for (int i = 0; i < dirList.size(); ++i) {
00287                 QFileInfo file(dirHandler, dirList.at(i));
00288 
00289                 if (!file.exists()) {
00290                         return;
00291                 }
00292 
00293                 // if pointing to a file which is .xml document
00294                 if (file.isFile() && (file.suffix() == QString("xml"))) {
00295 
00296                         /*
00297                         // if the file is valid IP-XACT document
00298                         if (validateIPXactDoc(file, schema)) {
00299                                 addFileToLibrary(file.filePath());
00300                         }
00301                         else {
00302                                 emit errorMessage(tr("File was not valid IP-XACT"));
00303                         }
00304                         */
00305 
00306                         // make sure the file is one of the supported IP-Xact types
00307                         if (checkDocType(file) != VLNV::INVALID) {
00308                                 addFileToLibrary(file.filePath());
00309                         }
00310                         
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 // if pointing to a directory
00314                 else if (file.isDir()) {
00315                         // call the function recursively to scan all subfolders
00316                         scanFolder(file.filePath()/*, schema*/);
00317                 }
00318         }
00319 }

00322 // Add a file with the path into library
00323 void LibraryData::addFileToLibrary(const QString& filePath) {
00324 
00325         // open the file to be read
00326         QFile IPXactFile(filePath);
00327 
00328         // if the file can not be opened
00329         if (!IPXactFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00330 
00331                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1").arg(filePath));
00332                 return;
00333         }
00334 
00335         QDomDocument document;
00336 
00337         // read the document and parse the VLNV info
00338         if (document.setContent(&IPXactFile)) {
00339                 IPXactModel IPModel(document, this);
00340                 VLNV vlnv(IPModel.getVLNV());
00341 
00342                 // close the file so its not left open accidentally
00343                 IPXactFile.close();
00344 
00345                 // if the VLNV already exists in the library
00346                 if (libraryItems_.contains(vlnv)) {
00347 
00348                         emit noticeMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was already found in the library").arg(
00349                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00350                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00351                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00352                                 vlnv.getVersion()));
00353                         return;
00354                 }
00355 
00356                 // if the file is valid IP-Xact
00357                 if (isValidIPXactFile(filePath)) {
00358 
00359                         // add the component to the library if parsing was successful
00360                         VLNV* vlnvP = const_cast<VLNV*>(&libraryItems_.insert(vlnv, filePath).key());
00361                         table_.append(vlnvP);
00362                 }
00363 
00364         }
00365         return;
00366 }
00367 
00368 // check the type of the IP-Xact document
00369 VLNV::IPXactType LibraryData::checkDocType(QFileInfo & file) {
00370         QFile docFile(file.filePath());
00371 
00372         // if the file can be opened
00373         if (docFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00374                 QDomDocument doc;
00375 
00376                 // if the document can be read to QDomDocument
00377                 if (doc.setContent(&docFile)) {
00378                         IPXactModel newModel(doc, this);
00379                         docFile.close();
00380                         return newModel.getDocType();
00381                 }
00382                 // content could not be read
00383                 else {
00384                         docFile.close();
00385                         return VLNV::INVALID;
00386                 }
00387         }
00388         // File could not be opened
00389         else {
00390                 return VLNV::INVALID;
00391         }
00392 }
00393 
00394 // validate IP-Xact document
00395 bool LibraryData::validateIPXactDoc(QFileInfo &file, QXmlSchema &schema) {
00396 
00397         // read the file to be validated into memory
00398         QFile testedFile(file.filePath());
00399         if (!testedFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00400                 return false;
00401         }
00402 
00403         // validate the document
00404         QXmlSchemaValidator validator(schema);
00405         bool result = validator.validate(&testedFile,
00406                         QUrl::fromLocalFile(testedFile.fileName()));
00407         testedFile.close();     // close the file
00408         return result;
00409 }

00453 
00454 void LibraryData::openLibraryFile( const QString filePath /*= QString()*/ ) {
00455         QString path;
00456 
00457         // set the path for the library file to use
00458 
00459         // if path was not specified then use the default
00460         if (filePath.isEmpty()) {
00461                 path = QDir::homePath() + QString("/") + KACTUS_LIBRARY_DIRNAME + 
00462                         QString("/") + KACTUS_LIBRARY_FILENAME;
00463         }
00464         // if specified then use it
00465         else 
00466                 path = filePath;
00467 
00468         // if there is no library file created
00469         QFileInfo libraryFile(path);
00470         if (!libraryFile.exists()) {
00471                 QString noticeMsg(tr("Library file was not found."));
00472                 emit noticeMessage(noticeMsg);
00473         }
00474 
00475         beginResetModel();
00476 
00477         // create the QSettings instance to read the file
00478         QSettings settings(path, QSettings::IniFormat, this);
00479 
00480         // get the size of the array
00481         int size = settings.beginReadArray("libraryItems");
00482 
00483         // read all the entries in the array
00484         for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
00485                 settings.setArrayIndex(i);
00486 
00487                 // read the settings
00488                 QString type = settings.value("type").toString();
00489                 QString vendor = settings.value("vendor").toString();
00490                 QString library = settings.value("library").toString();
00491                 QString name = settings.value("name").toString();
00492                 QString version = settings.value("version").toString();
00493                 //bool hidden = settings.value("hidden").toBool();
00494                 QString filePath = settings.value("path").toString();
00495                 bool validDocument = settings.value("validDocument", true).toBool();
00496 
00497                 // create a vlnv instance to match the read settings
00498                 VLNV vlnv(type, vendor, library, name, version, false);
00499                 vlnv.setDocumentValid(validDocument);
00500 
00501                 // if the file does not exist in file system
00502                 QFileInfo ipxactFile(filePath);
00503                 if (!ipxactFile.exists()) {
00504                         QString errorMsg(tr("File %1 was not found in file system.").arg(path));
00505                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00506                 }
00507 
00508                 // check if the vlnv already exists in the library
00509                 else if (libraryItems_.contains(vlnv)) {
00510                         QString errorMsg(tr("Duplicate VLNVs found in library: \n"
00511                                 "Vendor: %1\n"
00512                                 "Library: %2\n"
00513                                 "Name: %3\n"
00514                                 "Version: %4\n").arg(vendor).arg(library).arg(name).arg(version));
00515                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00516                 }
00517                 else if (!vlnv.isValid()) {
00518                         QString errorMsg(tr("Invalid VLNV found in library file: \n"
00519                                 "Vendor: %1\n"
00520                                 "Library: %2\n"
00521                                 "Name: %3\n"
00522                                 "Version: %4\n").arg(vendor).arg(library).arg(name).arg(version));
00523                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00524                 }
00525                 // if file is not valid IP-Xact
00526                 else if (!isValidIPXactFile(filePath))
00527                         continue;
00528 
00529                 else {
00530                         VLNV* vlnvP = const_cast<VLNV*>(&libraryItems_.insert(vlnv, filePath).key());
00531                         table_.append(vlnvP);
00532                 }
00533         }
00534         settings.endArray();
00535 
00536         endResetModel();
00537 
00538         // inform tree model that it should be reset
00539         emit resetModel();
00540 }
00541 
00542 VLNV* LibraryData::getOriginalPointer( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
00543         if (libraryItems_.contains(vlnv)) {
00544                 QMap<VLNV, QString>::const_iterator i = libraryItems_.find(vlnv);
00545                 VLNV* vlnvP = const_cast<VLNV*>(&i.key());
00546                 return vlnvP;
00547         }
00548         else
00549                 return 0;
00550 }
00551 
00552 void LibraryData::saveLibraryFile( const QString filePath /*= QString()*/ ) {
00553         QString path;
00554 
00555         // set the path for the library file to use
00556 
00557         // if path was not specified then use the default
00558         if (filePath.isEmpty()) {
00559                 path = QDir::homePath() + QString("/") + KACTUS_LIBRARY_DIRNAME + 
00560                         QString("/") + KACTUS_LIBRARY_FILENAME;
00561         }
00562         // if specified then use it
00563         else 
00564                 path = filePath;
00565 
00566         // create the QSettings instance to read the file
00567         QSettings settings(path, QSettings::IniFormat, this);
00568 
00569         unsigned int j = 0;
00570         settings.beginWriteArray("libraryItems");
00571         for (QMap<VLNV, QString>::const_iterator i = libraryItems_.constBegin();
00572                 i != libraryItems_.constEnd(); ++i) {
00573 
00574                         settings.setArrayIndex(j);
00575 
00576                         // if the file exists then write it to the library file
00577                         QFileInfo fileInfo(i.value());
00578                         if (fileInfo.exists()) {
00579 
00580                                 // write the settings
00581                                 settings.setValue("type", i.key().getTypestr());
00582                                 settings.setValue("vendor", i.key().getVendor());
00583                                 settings.setValue("library", i.key().getLibrary());
00584                                 settings.setValue("name", i.key().getName());
00585                                 settings.setValue("version", i.key().getVersion());
00586                                 //settings.setValue("hidden", i.key().isHidden());
00587                                 settings.setValue("path", i.value());
00588                                 settings.setValue("validDocument", i.key().documentIsValid());
00589 
00590                                 ++j;
00591                         }
00592                         // if file did not exist don't write it and give an error message
00593                         else {
00594                                 QString errorMsg(tr(
00595                                         "File %1 was not found in file system, skipping...").arg(
00596                                         i.value()));
00597                                 emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00598                         }
00599         }
00600         settings.endArray();
00601 }
00602 
00603 const QString LibraryData::getPath( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00604 
00605         if (libraryItems_.contains(vlnv))
00606                 return libraryItems_.value(vlnv);
00607         else {
00608                 emit errorMessage(tr("The VLNV \n"
00609                         "Vendor: %1\n"
00610                         "Library: %2\n"
00611                         "Name: %3\n"
00612                         "Version: %4\n"
00613                         "was not found in the library.").arg(
00614                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(vlnv.getName()).arg(
00615                         vlnv.getVersion()));
00616                 return QString();
00617         }
00618 }
00619 
00620 bool LibraryData::addVLNV( const VLNV& vlnv, const QString& path ) {
00621         if (libraryItems_.contains(vlnv)) {
00622                 emit errorMessage(tr("The VLNV \n"
00623                         "Vendor: %1\n"
00624                         "Library: %2\n"
00625                         "Name: %3\n"
00626                         "Version: %4\n"
00627                         "Already existed in the library and was not added.").arg(
00628                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(vlnv.getName()).arg(
00629                         vlnv.getVersion()));
00630                 return false;
00631         }
00632         QFileInfo fileInfo(path);
00633         if (!fileInfo.exists()) {
00634                 emit errorMessage(tr("The file %1 was not found in file system").arg(path));
00635                 return false;
00636         }
00637         // if file is not valid IP-Xact file or the vlnv does not match with the file
00638         else if (!isValidIPXactFile(path, vlnv))
00639                 return false;
00640 
00641         beginResetModel();
00642 
00643         // add the component to the library
00644         VLNV* vlnvP = const_cast<VLNV*>(&libraryItems_.insert(vlnv, path).key());
00645         table_.append(vlnvP);
00646 
00647         emit resetModel();
00648         endResetModel();
00649 
00650         saveLibraryFile();
00651 
00652         return true;
00653 }
00654 
00655 void LibraryData::updateVLNV( const QString& path, const VLNV& newVLNV ) {
00656 
00657         // find the old vlnv tags for the file
00658         QList<VLNV> oldKeys = libraryItems_.keys(path);
00659         for (int i = 0; i < oldKeys.size(); ++i) {
00660                 
00661                 // search the matching item in the table data structure
00662                 for (int j = 0; j < table_.size(); ++j) {
00663 
00664                         // if match is found
00665                         if (oldKeys.value(i) == *table_.value(j)) {
00666 
00667                                 // remove the item from the table also
00668                                 table_.removeAt(j);
00669                         }
00670                 }
00671 
00672                 // remove all old keys that are associated with the given file
00673                 libraryItems_.remove(oldKeys.value(i));
00674         }
00675 
00676         addVLNV(newVLNV, path);
00677 }
00678 
00679 bool LibraryData::contains( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00680         // if vlnv is found and it is of correct type
00681         return libraryItems_.contains(vlnv);
00682 }
00683 
00684 void LibraryData::onRemoveVLNV( VLNV* vlnv ) {
00685         
00686         // if vlnv does not belong to library
00687         if (!libraryItems_.contains(*vlnv))
00688                 return;
00689 
00690         int row = table_.indexOf(const_cast<VLNV*>(vlnv));
00691 
00692         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), row, row);
00693 
00694         // remove the vlnv, no delete operation is needed because VLNVs are statically
00695         // created
00696         table_.removeAt(row);
00697         libraryItems_.remove(*vlnv);
00698 
00699         endRemoveRows();
00700 
00701         saveLibraryFile();
00702 }

00747 //              return;

00750 //      vlnv->hide();
00751 //      endResetModel();
00752 // 
00753 //      saveLibraryFile();
00754 // }
00755 
00756 bool LibraryData::exists( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
00757         return libraryItems_.contains(vlnv);
00758 }
00759 
00760 void LibraryData::checkIntegrity() {
00761 
00762         emit noticeMessage(tr("Checking library integrity..."));
00763 
00764         beginResetModel();
00765 
00766         int max = libraryItems_.size();
00767         int current = 0;
00768         int errors = 0;
00769 
00770         // clear the table so only valid items are appended
00771         table_.clear();
00772 
00773         // if table contains different amount of object than the actual library
00774 //      if (max != table_.size()) {
00775 //              emit errorMessage(tr("The library is corrupted, refreshing..."));
00776 // 
00777 //              // clear all items from the table
00778 //              table_.clear();
00779 // 
00780 //              // add each vlnv to the table
00781 //              for (QMap<VLNV, QString>::iterator i = libraryItems_.begin();
00782 //                      i != libraryItems_.end(); ++i) {
00783 //                              VLNV* vlnvP = const_cast<VLNV*>(&i.key());
00784 //                              table_.append(vlnvP);
00785 //              }
00786 //      }
00787 
00788         // use mutable iterator so map can be modified 
00789         QMutableMapIterator<VLNV, QString> i(libraryItems_);
00790         while (i.hasNext()) {
00791                 // move iterator
00792                 i.next();
00793 
00794                 // if the not valid IP-Xact file
00795                 if (!isValidIPXactFile(i.value(), i.key())) {
00796                         emit errorMessage(tr("Object %1:%2:%3:%4 within file %5 was not valid"
00797                                 " IP-Xact, removing object.").arg(
00798                                 i.key().getVendor()).arg(
00799                                 i.key().getLibrary()).arg(
00800                                 i.key().getName()).arg(
00801                                 i.key().getVersion()).arg(
00802                                 i.value()));
00803                         i.remove();
00804                 }
00805         }
00806 
00807         // create the progress bar that displays the progress of the check
00808         QProgressBar progBar;
00809         progBar.setRange(0, max);
00810         progBar.setValue(current);
00811         progBar.setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
00812         progBar.setFormat(tr("Processing item %v of %m (%p%)"));
00813         progBar.move(handler_->mapToGlobal(handler_->geometry().topRight()));
00814         progBar.setWindowTitle(tr("Checking integrity..."));
00815         progBar.show();
00816 
00817         // parse each document in the library and check it's references to files and
00818         // other documents
00819         for (QMap<VLNV, QString>::iterator i = libraryItems_.begin();
00820                 i != libraryItems_.end(); ++i) {
00821 
00822                         VLNV* vlnvP = const_cast<VLNV*>(&i.key());
00823 
00824                         // in the start assume that document is valid and if errors are 
00825                         // found the set document as invalid
00826                         vlnvP->setDocumentValid(true);
00827         
00828                         emit noticeMessage(tr("Processing item: \n"
00829                                 "\tVendor: %1\n"
00830                                 "\tLibrary: %2\n"
00831                                 "\tName: %3\n"
00832                                 "\tVersion: %4").arg(vlnvP->getVendor()).arg(
00833                                 vlnvP->getLibrary()).arg(vlnvP->getName()).arg(
00834                                 vlnvP->getVersion()));
00835 
00836                         QFileInfo topFile(i.value());
00837                         if (!topFile.exists()) {
00838                                 emit errorMessage(
00839                                         tr("The file %1 for the document was not found.").arg(
00840                                         i.value()));
00841                                 ++errors;
00842                                 vlnvP->setDocumentValid(false);
00843                                 continue;
00844                         }
00845 
00846                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(i.key());
00847                         if (!libComp) {
00848                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not parse file %1").arg(i.value()));
00849                                 vlnvP->setDocumentValid(false);
00850                                 ++errors;
00851                                 continue;
00852                         }
00853 
00854                         // check that all VLNVs needed by this model are found in the library
00855                         QList<VLNV> vlnvList = libComp->getDependentVLNVs();
00856                         for (int j = 0; j < vlnvList.size(); ++j) {
00857                                 
00858                                 // if the document referenced by this model is not found
00859                                 if (!libraryItems_.contains(vlnvList.value(j))) {
00860                                         emit errorMessage(
00861                                                 tr("The following vlnv was not found in the library: \n"
00862                                                 "\tVendor: %1\n"
00863                                                 "\tLibrary: %2\n"
00864                                                 "\tName: %3\n"
00865                                                 "\tVersion: %4\n").arg(vlnvList.value(j).getVendor()).arg(
00866                                                 vlnvList.value(j).getLibrary()).arg(
00867                                                 vlnvList.value(j).getName()).arg(
00868                                                 vlnvList.value(j).getVersion()));
00869                                         vlnvP->setDocumentValid(false);
00870                                         ++errors;
00871                                 }
00872                         }
00873 
00874                         // check all files referenced by this model
00875                         QStringList filelist = libComp->getDependentFiles();
00876                         for (int j = 0; j <filelist.size(); ++j) {
00877 
00878                                 // make sure that each file referenced by the model exists
00879                                 // in the file system
00880                                 QString path = General::getAbsolutePath(i.value(), filelist.value(j));
00881                                 
00882                                 // if the path did not exist
00883                                 if (path.isEmpty()) {
00884 
00885                                         // print the relative path because absolute path does not exist
00886                                         path = filelist.value(j);
00887                                         
00888                                         emit errorMessage(
00889                                                 tr("File %1 was not found in the file system.").arg(
00890                                                 path));
00891                                         vlnvP->setDocumentValid(false);
00892                                         ++errors;
00893                                 }
00894                         }
00895 
00896                         // add the item to the table
00897                         table_.append(vlnvP);
00898 
00899                         // update the progress bar
00900                         ++current;
00901                         progBar.setValue(current);
00902         }
00903         
00904         // the progress bar can now be hidden
00905         progBar.hide();
00906 
00907         // integrity check done, save the library file
00908         saveLibraryFile();
00909 
00910         // inform tree model that it needs to reset model also
00911         emit resetModel();
00912         endResetModel();
00913 
00914         emit noticeMessage(
00915                 tr("Library integrity check complete, errors: %1").arg(errors));
00916 }
00917 
00918 VLNV::IPXactType LibraryData::getType( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
00919 
00920         if (!libraryItems_.contains(vlnv))
00921                 return VLNV::INVALID;
00922         else {
00923                 QMap<VLNV, QString>::const_iterator i = libraryItems_.find(vlnv);
00924                 return i.key().getType();
00925         }
00926 }
00927 
00928 void LibraryData::updatePath( const VLNV& vlnv, const QString& path ) {
00929 
00930         // if the object does not yet exist in the library
00931         if (!libraryItems_.contains(vlnv))
00932                 return;
00933         else {
00934                 libraryItems_.insert(vlnv, path);
00935         }
00936 
00937 }
00938 
00939 void LibraryData::onOpenComponent(const QModelIndex& index) {
00940         if (!index.isValid())
00941                 return;
00942 
00943         VLNV* vlnv = static_cast<VLNV*>(index.internalPointer());
00944 
00945         if (!vlnv->isValid())
00946                 return;
00947 
00948         if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT)
00949                 emit editItem(*vlnv);
00950 }
00951 
00952 void LibraryData::onDeleteItem(const QModelIndex& index) {
00953         if (!index.isValid())
00954                 return;
00955 
00956         VLNV* vlnv = static_cast<VLNV*>(index.internalPointer());
00957 
00958         // inform tree model that vlnv is to be removed
00959         emit removeVLNV(vlnv);
00960 
00961         onRemoveVLNV(vlnv);
00962 }

01008 
01009 bool LibraryData::isValidIPXactFile( const QString& filePath, 
01010                                                                         const VLNV& vlnvToCompare /*= VLNV()*/ ) {
01011 
01012         QFileInfo fileInfo(filePath);
01013         
01014         // if file does not exist
01015         if (!fileInfo.exists())
01016                 return false;
01017 
01018         // if file is not xml
01019         else if (fileInfo.suffix() != QString("xml"))
01020                 return false;
01021 
01022         // open the file to be read
01023         QFile IPXactFile(filePath);
01024 
01025         // if the file can not be opened
01026         if (!IPXactFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
01027 
01028                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1").arg(filePath));
01029                 return false;
01030         }
01031 
01032         QDomDocument document;
01033 
01034         // read the document and parse the VLNV info
01035         if (document.setContent(&IPXactFile)) {
01036                 IPXactModel IPModel(document, this);
01037                 VLNV vlnv(IPModel.getVLNV());
01038 
01039                 // if vlnv to compare is given but the vlnvs don't match
01040                 if (vlnvToCompare.isValid() && vlnvToCompare != vlnv) {
01041                         return false;
01042                 }
01043 
01044                 // close the file so its not left open accidentally
01045                 IPXactFile.close();
01046 
01047                 // make sure the component can be parsed before adding it to the library
01048                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp;
01049                 try {
01050                         // create correct type of object and cast the pointer
01051                         switch (vlnv.getType()) {
01052                         case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
01053                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new BusDefinition(document));
01054                                 break;
01055                                                                           }
01056                         case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
01057                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new Component(document));
01058                                 break;
01059                                                                   }
01060                         case VLNV::DESIGN: {
01061                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new Design(document));
01062                                 break;
01063                                                            }
01064 
01065                         case VLNV::GENERATORCHAIN: {
01066                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new GeneratorChain(document));
01067                                 break;
01068                                                                            }
01069                         case VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION: {
01070                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new DesignConfiguration(document));
01071                                 break;
01072                                                                                         }
01073 
01074                         case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION: {
01075                                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(new AbstractionDefinition(document));
01076                                 break;
01077                                                                                           }
01078                         default: {
01079                                 emit noticeMessage(tr("Document was not supported type"));
01080                                 return false;
01081                                          }
01082                         }
01083                 }
01084                 // if an exception occurred during the parsing
01085                 catch (Parse_error error) {
01086                         QString errorMsg(error.what() + QString(" ") + error.errorMsg() +
01087                                 tr(" within file: %1").arg(filePath));
01088                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
01089                         return false;
01090                 }
01091                 catch (...) {
01092                         emit errorMessage(
01093                                 tr("Error occurred during parsing of the document %1").arg(filePath));
01094                         return false;
01095                 }
01096         }
01097         
01098         // everything went ok
01099         IPXactFile.close();
01100         return true;
01101 }
